# sophiecod.es

Code of my personal website [sophiecod.es](https://www.sophiecod.es/) bootstrapped by [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/) and deployed on [netlify](https://www.netlify.com/).


To fork and work with this project follow these steps:
    
   

    # Install the Gatsby CLI
    npm install -g gatsby-cli

    # Clone the repository
    git clone https://github.com/smuibrig/personal-website

    # Go inside the directory
    cd personal-website

    # Start development server
    gatsby develop

    The site is running at http://localhost:8000
